alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 9:25AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee, Echols, Atkinson, Clinch, northwestern Charlton and west central Appling Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 923 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rochelle to 6 miles southwest of Lenox to 10 miles south of Thomasville. The line movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Homerville, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Fargo, Argyle, Statenville and Du Pont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms are likely to intensify and become severe in nature, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Western Charlton
